name: Send Email
natural_language_description: 这是 Send Email 节点。主要用于: Sends an Email

fromEmail.name: fromEmail
fromEmail.description: Email address of the sender optional with name
fromEmail.natural_language_description: 参数名: From Email | 作用: Email address of the sender optional with name | (必填项)

toEmail.name: toEmail
toEmail.natural_language_description: 参数名: To Email | 作用: Email address of the recipient | (必填项)

ccEmail.name: ccEmail
ccEmail.natural_language_description: 参数名: CC Email | 作用: Email address of CC recipient

bccEmail.name: bccEmail
bccEmail.natural_language_description: 参数名: BCC Email | 作用: Email address of BCC recipient

subject.name: subject
subject.natural_language_description: 参数名: Subject | 作用: Subject line of the email

text.name: text
text.natural_language_description: 参数名: Text | 作用: Plain text message of email

html.name: html
html.natural_language_description: 参数名: HTML | 作用: HTML text message of email

attachments.name: attachments
attachments.description: Name of the binary properties that contain data to add to email as attachment. Multiple ones can be comma-separated.
attachments.natural_language_description: 参数名: Attachments | 作用: Name of the binary properties that contain data to add to email as attachment. Multiple ones can be comma-separated.

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: allowUnauthorizedCerts (值: None) - Whether to connect even if SSL certificate validation is not possible
replyTo (值: None) - The email address to send the reply to
